original_text: Do not go into that land. The Lord is not with you. So your enemies will win against you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희 중에 계시지 아니하니 올라가지 말라 너희의 대적 앞에서 패할까 하노라

sentences.original_text: Do not go into that land
The Lord is not with you
So your enemies will win against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희 원수들이 너희를 이길 것이다
